page.title: 15WOODWARM STOVES LTD.
page.content: Woodwarm Stoves make mainly woodburning stoves. They have 22 models in their range with many different options. They also make individual stoves to a client's specifications. Twenty people are employed on the site and everything is made in Uffculme. Metal castings are obtained from Gloucester and glass from Japan. Metal plate comes from various sources depending on the current price. The firm began in Cullomton in 1974 and moved to Uffculme in 1979. Stoves are sold chiefly in Britain, Chile and Japan. They can be delivered to any part of Britain within 24 hours. As well as stoves they also make agricultural implements such as animal food troughs and parts for lorries on occassions.Overheads for premises are low;haulage of materials is expensive.
